title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/nrs-luda.html
notes:
Hi there.


As a long term reader and fan, I've been dabbling with scam baits lately.
... I had a lengthy one over Christmas and I humbly
submit the text, for possible inclusion in your fine website.


Obviously my name is not really Nigel Ryan-Schama, I picked that name
because if you squint while you read it, it looks like . . . . well, you
can work it out I'm sure.


Keep up the good work !
"Kindest regards, Nigel Ryan-Schama"

14th December


Delivery to the following recipient failed permanently:


 admin@mmproje.local


Technical details of permanent failure:


DNS Error: Domain name not found

The good guys

scammer dragged into this bait from an entirely different scam.

*Pay attention, children, invented rival scammers are a classic scambaiting technique.


Here goes . . .
messages.raw:
The characters in this saga:

The lads
Mrs Marina Luda, itinerant businesswoman
Reverend Terry Tunde, member of the "Nigeria Award Compensation Authority Unit Payout"

The good guys
Nigel Ryan-Schama, US businessman
Barrister Richard Suka, also known as Mykwile Amzizadique, an invented* scammer who was scamming Nigel in some other case plus a tiny cameo from Mr Sherif Dyro, of Burkina Faso, a genuine (?) scammer dragged into this bait from an entirely different scam.
*Pay attention, children, invented rival scammers are a classic scambaiting technique.

Here goes . . .

messages.body:
admin@mmproje.local



Attn : Beneficiary,


I'm Mrs Marina Luda of Tampa, FL 33629.But reside In New York for Now, I'm
a US citizen, I'm 51yrs old. I'm one of those that took part in the
inheritance/Compensation in Nigeria many years ago and they refused to pay
me, I had paid over $78,000 while in the US, trying to get my payment all
to no avail.


So I decided to travel down to Nigeria with all my compensation documents,
so i was directed to meet , who is the member of
COMPENSATION AWARD AUTHORITY and a Human Rights Activist , and I contacted
him and he explained everything to me. He said whoever is contacting us
through emails are fake.


He took me to the paying bank for the claim of my compensation payment.
Right now I'm the most happiest woman on earth because I have received my
compensation funds amounting to $11,000,000.00 Moreover,Rev.Terry Tunde,
showed me the full information of those that are yet to receive their
payments and I saw your email as one of the scam victims, that is why I
decided to email you to stop dealing with those people, they are not with
your fund, they are only making money out of you. I will advise you to
contact Rev.Terry Tunde.you have to contact him directly on this
information below.


COMPENSATION AWARD AUTHORITY
Name : Rev.Terry Tunde(Rev.Father)
Email: rev.terryembassy@w.cn
Telephone number- +234-8031879819


You really have to stop dealing with those people that are contacting you
and telling you that your fund is with them, it is not in anyway with them,
they are only taking advantage of you and they will dry you up until you
have nothing.


The only money I paid after I met Rev.Terry Tunde was just $550 for the
paper works which according to him is compulsory, take note of that.


Thank You and Be Blessed


Marina Luda


"So I decided to travel down..."

This 'format' has appeared on Scamorama a few times:


hw much will u pay me 4 a start - an eight-month adventure from Rabbi Ben Zona (humble cleric and father).


ATTILA THE LAD - in which the Lad pretends to be Hungarian, the scambaiter answers in Hungarian, the Lad answers BACK in Hungarian, they carry on like this, then the scambaiter introduces an imaginary rival scammer who tells the first (real) scammer to step aside, and the real scammer asks what he gets in return!

And now back to our regularly scheduled scambait...

messages.body:
rev.terryembassy@w.cn



15th December, 10:24 am


to Nigel Ryan-Schama



NIGERIA AWARD COMPENSATION AUTHORITY UNIT PAYOUT


36, filovtsev t  #2893 Street, Kiuv, Victoria island lagos nigeria.
TEL +234-8031879819



May the peace of The Almighty God be with you and your lovely family Nigel
Ryan Schama ,


Thank you for contacting Rev.Father Terry Tunde and Compensation
associate,your message and information's therein was duly noted and i have
carefully read your email and discovered that you have been dealing with
some impostors who disguise themselves as government agent or staff of the
Bank,telling you some sort of sweet stories in order to rip you off your
hard earn money.


Note,that you have to stop dealing with this men immediately because they
are not in position to release your payment and does not have the
credibility to do so,if you continue sending money to this impostors,they
will keep asking for more until you will be left with nothing to pay your
bills or even take care of your social life.My Office has facilitated over
400 payment of innocent beneficiaries that has fallen victim to this
impostors so your case is a similar one.


However,i want you to understand that for the fact that a lot of foreign
beneficiaries has lost so much money trying to get their inheritance,the
Federal government has therefore implement a new method / mode of conduct
for beneficiaries to receive their payment without having to pay huge
amount of money and this implies the provision of INSPECTION WAIVER OPTION
CERTIFICATE,that can be secured from the Federal treasury board (FTB).This
inspection waiver certificate is an authoritative order to
Organization,Banks or group of people in possession of your funds to
release payment immediately to any foreign beneficiary and whatever is owed
by you can be paid when you have finally received your payment/transfer in
your account.


Many foreign benefactors have received their payment by means of procuring
this inspection waiver for  $550 only,therefore i will advise you to get
this inspection waiver today so that i can forward it to the organization
in possession of your payment and your payment must be released to you
within 48hrs.As a matter of fact,you have made a better choice by
contacting this firm and we assure you of efficient service in future.


Make sure you send the $550 for the Inspection waiver today by way of
western union or money gram with the below information's :


Receivers name : OLU NNADI
Destination : Lagos / Nigeria
Text Question : to who ?
Answer : Olu
Mtcn# : known as western union reference number is required for pick up by
receiver.



As soon as you send this fee,i shall proceed to procure the inspection
waiver immediately and we will commence to file this evidence to your
paying Bank for the immediate transfer exercise of your fund as agreed
without further delay.


I also demand to know how much money that you have paid to those impostors
in the past and also make sure that you reconfirm your billing address and
private mobile numbers for easy communication.


Thank you for your cooperation.


Rev.Father Terry Tunde

16th December. to Marina Luda

 Have you met Reverend Terry personally ? Is he a trustworthy man ? It's
good to know that a Christian is working so hard to get people their due
money. What can you tell me about the Reverend ?

in Lagos for over a year now, who is handling an inheritance fund for me.

Please tell me, has your life been changed now that you have your funds ?

20th December


Dear Marina


 Thank you for your message. How did you first come into contact with the
reverend ? It seems to have been a stroke of great good fortune that your
paths would cross. Have you any idea how the reverend got into this line of

is able to arrange the release of funds like yours. And are you absolutely

 Do you visit London often ? I occasionally visit London too. I haven't
been there this year, but I hope to go in February next year. I live in

could meet up.


 Do you think I should tell  that I have been in
touch with you and the reverend ?


 Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

20th December


Dear Reverend Terry


Yes, I have received lots of e-mails from you, thank you for your
perseverance. I have been very busy preparing for Christmas. Like I said in
my earlier e-mail, I am conversing with Mrs Marina to begin with, and once
all that is sorted out, I will be in touch with you again.


I don't want us to talk about business yet, I would love it if you could
help me get my funds but I accept that is unlikely to happen before
Christmas and January is more likely.


In the meantime, while I don't want to talk about business yet, I'd love to
hear about your preparations for Christmas in your part of the world.


Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
10th Jan to Rev. Terry


Dear Reverend


 Thank you for your mail.


I have a number of comments.


 1) You know perfectly well why I have been delaying responding to you. It
is because I have been liaising with Mrs Marina Luda, God bless her soul,
in order to satisfy myself about your credentials and capabilities. My,
what a woman she is ! Did you not feel the hand of GOD working through her
when you met her ? I have big big plans for Marina and me once I get the
ATM card !!! But anyway, I have told you this several times, so I don't
understand why you ask the question.


 2) I am now satisfied in principle of your credentials and capabilities,
and am ready to proceed with you in a proper business-like manner to
arrange release of my funds via yourself.


 3) This MUST be done in a business-like manner, I tell you. There must be
no more slapdash rants about "Did you get my last message ?" and such like.
I have explained before why that is a nonsensical question. I have received
many e-mails from you, and have replied to every single one. Please don't
ask me this question again. If you are worried that I may not have received
a certain message from you, you must ask something like "Did you receive
the e-mail that I sent you on Thursday 1st January at 4pm"


 4) I have confidence in your abilities, but I have not yet told you any of
the details of the correspondence I have been engaged in with the beast
, may God curse his soul. Do you not wish to see
these details before committing to releasing the fund ?


 5) Can I pay by bank transfer instead of Western Union ? This is far
quicker, cheaper and easier. I don't even know where the nearest Western
Union office is, but if you told me your bank account details I could
arrange for the funds to be in your account in the next few minutes.


 Please get back to me on all of these points immediately.


 Kindest regards
 Nigel Ryan-Schama

Oh OK, I'm real glad to hear that. If you are switching to another e-mail account, can you let me know it please so that we can stay in touch ? It's great to hear from you again.

Marina, it's not going great with the Reverend, I regret to tell you. I have sent him the $550 dillars he said was required for the fee, but he has not sent me the ATM card yet and he has not been in touch for several days. He keeps ranting about delays an d claiming I haven't paid him but I've sent him the MTCN number and everything. He just doesn't seem very professional. Marina Luda, I'm sure you are totally profeshonal in all your business dealings, as you have been in your comntacts with me, and you know the standarsd that are required for doing business in the modern world. Di d you expreience anything like this when you were fealing with the Reverend ? He seems to be an incompetent oaf, if you don't mind my talking that way about a man who claims to be a man of God.

Write back soon and let me know when we can plan to meet up.

Kindest regards
Nigel Ryan-Schama

messages.body:
13th Feb, to Marina Luda and Rev. Terry Tunde


OK Marina and Terry, I have some bad news for you.


 I don't exist.


Barrister Richard Suka doesn't exist either.


And Mykwile Amzizadique doesn't exist either. Can you believe it ?


 But it's OK, because I know you two don't exist either. Maybe you're
really the same jackass. Oy maybe you're a pair of jackasses.


I don't know and I don't really care, but it was fun yanking your chains.


 I know you're scammers, and pretty dumb ones at that. I suggest you give
up scamming and doing something more useful, and more suited to your
limited intelligence, like killing yourselves and having your bodies made
into fertiliser.


Now THAT would be useful, and something that you idiots might be able to
accomplish.


 Have a nice day !


 Kindest regards


 Nigel Ryan-Schama

And after that, silence . . .
